parameters: I'll guard you from the rear.
Just hurry up and set the bomb!
Alright, this is it. This door is all that stands
Come on, just a little further...

\N[1], get down there now! I don't know how much time
we have left. We still have one more door in place,
but once that's down there's not much we can do.
\n<\N[1]>I'm not letting that happen. Leave it to me!
They're here! I need reinforcements, stat!
Get ready, Shinra mutt! All this training wasn't for
No! How could she- there's not enough time!
Hold her as long as you can!
Oh, I'll do more than that!
After everything you've done to our comrades, every
sin you've committed against our planet...
killing you ten times wouldn't be enough!
The planet would never accept someone like you.
I can't let you ruin this!

\n<\N[1]>That didn't do anything...! This is my end...
\n<\N[1]>Test countdown complete? Sheesh! I need a raise.
qsprite 0 play phone lock pause wait
\n<\N[1]>I did it. The group in the reactor has been
neutralized, and the bomb is not activated.
\nPhew... Good work. You helped avert a city-wide
\n<\N[1]>I just don't understand why they wanted to destroy
a mako reactor like this. So many lives wasted...
\n<Tseng>I don't know either. But there'll be time for
debriefing once you're back. And for celebrations
of course. For now, rendezvous with Reno and return to HQ.
